调查 COVID-19 大流行期间大学生的饮酒情况、心理健康状况和酒精相关问题研究人员调查了大学生的饮酒情况、心理健康状况以及与酒精相关的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Investigating-alcohol-use-mental-health-status-and-alcohol-lated-problems-in-university-students-amid-the-COVID-19-流行病.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Investigating-alcohol-use-mental-health-status-and-alcohol-lated-problems-in-university-students-amid-the-COVID-19-大流行.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a93d5dda-3f19-4f39-a348-64831eb37da6 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 06:08:00 -0400 Investigating alcohol use, mental health status, and alcohol-related problems in university students amid the COVID-19 pandemic
研究发现内源性胆汁酸可缓解非酒精性脂肪肝一项研究发现猪去氧胆酸通过调节肠肝轴来缓解非酒精性脂肪肝。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Study-identizes-an-endogenous-bile-acid-that-alleviates-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Study-identizes-an-endogenous-bile-acid-that-alleviates-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efd11be6-73ea-4a31-83db-1c3520321144 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 05:40:00 -0400 Study identifies an endogenous bile acid that alleviates non-alcoholic fatty liver disease

不规律的睡眠模式是否与死亡风险增加有关？研究人员检查了睡眠规律是否与全因疾病、心血管疾病 (CVD) 和癌症死亡率增加的风险相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Are-irregular-sleep-patterns- Associated-with-increased-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Are-irregular-sleep-patterns- Associated-with-increased-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d425728f-47d6-4491-96b6-b3c33ab04221 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 05:34:00 -0400 Are irregular sleep patterns associated with increased mortality risk?

新型有机电极可能彻底改变电疗隆德大学和哥德堡大学的研究人员成功开发出了可以无缝集成到生物系统中的临时有机电极。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/New-organic-electrodes-could-revolutionize-electrictherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/New-organic-electrodes-could-revolutionize-electrictherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88b49834-dfb1-44d3-b15d-b50c18c8900a Mon, 21 Aug 2023 23:11:15 -0400 New organic electrodes could revolutionize electrotherapy
研究发现 Omicron 感染可能会增加再感染的风险麦克马斯特大学的研究人员发现，第一波 Omicron 疫情期间的感染并没有赋予他们对未来感染的免疫力，而是让他们研究的老年人在第二波 Omicron 疫情期间更容易再次感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Omicron-infection-may-increase-risk-of-reinfection-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Omicron-infection-may-increase-risk-of-reinfection-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4b743f3-97dd-409c-9e8f-a0fa06e82631 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 23:07:00 -0400 Omicron infection may increase risk of reinfection, study finds
